title: Getting support docs
introduction: Use the docs and API and SDK reference to learn about support plan options, how to use the Support Center for self-guided resolutions to your issues, and how to open and manage support cases when needed.

section_recommended.title: Using the Support Center
section_recommended.description: Discover the best way to get the support that you need by utilizing the Support Center.

section_recommended.title: Basic, Advanced, and Premium Support plans
section_recommended.description: IBM Cloud offers different support plans to fit your business needs.

section_recommended.title: Creating support cases
section_recommended.description: Create a support case to have a support engineer review your issue and help you resolve the problem you're experiencing.

tiles.title: Scoping support cases
tiles.description: You now have options to narrow the subject of your case to a specific topic that's most closely related to the issue you're experiencing. As a result, you can ensure that your support case gets routed to the appropriate support engineer and resolved as efficiently as possible.

tiles.title: Enhanced Support Center
tiles.description: The updated Support Center provides an improved experience for creating and managing support cases. You can refine the scope of your cases by routing them to a specfic resource and provide feedback on your cases.

tiles.title: Improved Support Center
tiles.description: The Support Center offers you a personlized experience from the landing page where you can easily view incidents that are specific to your account along with a list of your open cases.
